content: वाजः [वज्-घञ्] {@--1@} A wing. {@--2@} A feather. {@--3@} The feather of an arrow. {@--4@} Battle, conflict. {@--5@} Sound. --जं {@--1@} Clarified butter. {@--2@} An oblation of rice offered at a Śrāddha or obsequial ceremony. {@--3@} Food in general. {@--4@} Water. {@--5@} A prayer or {%mantra%} with which a sacrifice is concluded. {@--6@} A sacrifice. {@--7@} Strength, power. {@--8@} Wealth. {@--9@} Speed. {@--10@} A month.
